legacy-intro: С чего все началось? Ознакомьтесь с проектами, которые я делала на курсах FreeCodeCamp

lads-battles.title: Love and Deepspace Battles
lads-battles.description: Сайт для сбора персонажей в Love and Deepspace (LADS) с детальной информацией о навыках, оружии, геймплее и т.д. Создан, чтобы помочь разобраться с боевыми механиками на нескольких языках.

weather-app.title: Сайт с погодой
weather-app.description: A fully responsive weather application that visualizes real-time weather through dynamic, animated scenes and supports several languages. The app adjusts visuals by location, and time of day.

html-css.title: Responsive Web Design
html-css.description: Базовые проекты, выполненные для курса Responsive Web Design (Респосивный Веб Дизайн) на платформе FreeCodeCamp в 2024

survey-form.title: Survey Form
survey-form.description: My very first webpage! Built to fulfill the 'Build a Survey Form' challenge. I practiced using different input types, buttons, and form properties while learning about HTML structure and 'id' attributes.

tribute-page.title: Tribute Page
tribute-page.description: The second project focused on building a tribute page. I practiced working with images and understanding how 'id' attributes help with styling and navigation.

technical-documentation.title: Technical Documentation Page
technical-documentation.description: For the third project, I built a technical documentation page. The main focus was on creating a responsive navigation bar and organizing content with semantic sections.

product-landing.title: Product Landing Page
product-landing.description: The fourth project required building a product landing page. I practiced making layouts responsive using media queries and flexbox, while working with pre-defined requirements.

personal-portfolio-webpage.title: Personal Portfolio Webpage
personal-portfolio-webpage.description: The final project brought everything together - building a personal portfolio. I used navigation bars, external links, media queries, and viewport height properties to create a complete, responsive site.

certificate.title: Responsive Web Design Certificate
certificate.description: Certificate earned after completing all 5 required projects, demonstrating foundational knowledge of HTML and CSS for web development.

js.title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data
js.description: Simple projects made for FreeCodeCamp's JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Course in 2024

palindrome-checker.title: Palindrome Checker
palindrome-checker.description: Built to detect whether a given string reads the same forwards and backwards, ignoring punctuation, case, and spacing

roman-numeral-converter.title: Roman Numeral Converter
roman-numeral-converter.description: Converts Arabic numbers (1-3999) into Roman numerals with proper subtraction notation (IV, IX, XL, XC, CD, CM).

telephone-number-validator.title: Telephone Number Validator
telephone-number-validator.description: Validates US phone numbers in various formats, with optional country code (must be 1) and proper area code requirements

cash-register.title: Cash Register
cash-register.description: Calculates change due based on purchase price, cash provided, and current cash-in-drawer (CID), handling three possible statuses: OPEN, CLOSED, and INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS.

RPG-creature-search-app.title: RPG Creature Search App
RPG-creature-search-app.description: Fetches Pokémon data from freeCodeCamp's RPG Creature API based on name or ID and displays stats, types, and attributes.

certificate.title: JS Algorithms & Data Structures Certificate
certificate.description: Certificate earned after completing all 5 projects, demonstrating proficiency in JavaScript fundamentals and problem-solving.

libraries.title: Front-End Libraries
libraries.description: Simple projects made for FreeCodeCamp's Front-End Libraries Course in the first half of 2025

random-quote-machine.title: Random Quote Machine
random-quote-machine.description: Fetches a random quote from the API and displays it on the page while changing background as well

markdown-previewer.title: Markdown Previewer
markdown-previewer.description: Allows users to write Markdown in an editor and see the rendered HTML output in real-time

drum-machine.title: Drum Machine
drum-machine.description: Allows users to play two sets of Kits by nine notes each, turn the machine on and off, and change the volume. Additional features: power on/off toggle, volume control, and two switchable sound banks.

js-calculator.title: JavaScript Calculator
js-calculator.description: Allows users to do simple arithmetic calculations

25-5.title: Pomodoro Clock Project
25-5.description: a 25 + 5 Clock (also known as a Pomodoro Timer) that allows users to: set custom work and break intervals, start, pause, and reset the timer, and receive visual and audio alerts when the timer ends

certificate.title: Front End Development Libraries Certificate
certificate.description: Certificate earned after completing all 5 projects using frontend libraries. The projects required any frontend libraried to be used in achiving passing scores, preferably the ones taught on the FCC's course lessons (Bootstrap, iQuery, SASS, Redux, React). Personally, I used React 18 for all the projects.
